record.name: bizonline
record.paragraph: So i purchased this theme as it did seem to have basically everything i was looking for and probably a little more also, so far what i like is the developer seems to have put a great deal of time to make this a premium theme, there is just so much packed into it. The documentation is fantastic and very helpful. The customization is fantastic and very easy. all in all this is well worth the money spent!

record.name: Stulk
record.paragraph: I have found Anitya to be very full featured as an initial theme for my corporate site. I've forgotten more than I know about HTML/CSS and web design in general, so its nice to have something that looks very professional, is quick to load, and has modern features. Several people have made very positive comments about the design, look and feel and usability of my draft site. It took me a bit of getting used to - many of the features are activated through configuration vice just being "drop and play" - however, usability of the theme in the designer is very good once you understand how it's constructed. It is very consistent. The developer also seems to be very responsive through the support forum. I'm confident any issues I'll have will be addressed - or at least acknowledged.

record.name: jgaryt
record.paragraph: I really do like this theme and its flexibility. I believe it has a ton of potential, and already contains some great ideas. I hope the dev can address some of the key issues soon. I believe that with a few more revisions it will be worth the money. (Full disclosure: at the time of this writing, I own six copies.)
